name: Shift Runner
description:
'SHIFT' is the first game I developed (2017)

Inspired by the old flash 'Shift Game', for a submission in the first year of my degree I created an endless runner in the same graphical style.

Sadly my complete source code and documentation for the 'finished' game / submission have been lost to the annals of time.

-=-=-=-=-=CONTROLS=-=-=-=-=-

Left Shift - Shift (invert the colour you are currently on)

Space - Jump (Does this really need explaining?)

-=-=-=-=-=CREDITS=-=-=-=-=-

Graphics - Myself

Music - The music was not created by myself, and I am unable to identify the original track. However tracing the song back, it has a strong resemblance to 'Android' by Kraddy
